title: ICYMI: Scam Goddess on the Worst Fraud She Ever Fell For
description:
Scams are everywhere. From the Fyre Festival to Anna Delvy to LuLaRoe, fraudsters just seem to be getting more and more popular these days. On today’s episode, Rachelle and Madison welcome Laci Mosley, host of the podcast Scam Goddess, to talk about her love of scams and scammers, how she’s been scammed herself, and why she thinks we are all so obsessed with these audacious grifters.
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder and Derek John.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: ICYMI: Scam Goddess on the Worst Fraud She Ever Fell For
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Laci Mosley dishes about Shaun King, Karen Civil, and her own hilarious scam experiences.
